content: Welcome to all the new folks that have signed up! If you're here for GSoC, don't be shy. Start a new topic to introduce yourself and your interests. We can help you get started.
@Sean I would like to follow the annotation project you announced and help if I can. also, I would like to participate in other projects as GSoC student.
We can submit proposals only for high-priority topics (https://brlcad.org/wiki/Google_Summer_of_Code/Project_Ideas#High_Priority_Topics), right?

@ANUJ MITTAL technically, you can submit proposals for anything, even the ideas that are not on this page. We consider and go through all the proposals (even the new ideas). When I was a student, my GSoC project was initially a new idea not on the list.

Having said that, high priority topics are the most important to us, so the proposals written on them would have a considerable preference over the lower priority ones.
